sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for cleaning laboratory equipment after use.
sections.scope: Applicable to all laboratory equipment used in teaching laboratories.
procedure: Switch OFF and unplug the equipment before cleaning.
Remove residues using suitable cleaning agents.
Wipe external surfaces with clean cloth.
precautions: Wear appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE) when cleaning equipment.
Ensure equipment is completely powered off before cleaning.
Avoid using excessive water on electrical components.
